credit_line: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a; weft selvedge to selvedge): 41.5 x 131 cm (16 5/16 x 51 9/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 16 x 55 cm (6 5/16 x 21 5/8 in.)
title: Textile (airline upholstery)
medium:
Medium: 
Technique: A: combination of two structures. B: satin with continuous supplementary wefts.
description: Designs for airline upholstery. Component A is a design of flattened flowers on an abstracted diamond grid. Gold, off-white and blue. Grommets at top. Irregular shape. Component B is the source for A with the same design but 1/12 the size in gold, grey, beige and two blues.
name: Textile (airline upholstery)
